>
[Tentacle Cannon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1172)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 156</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A tentacle cannon is a _+1 striking weapon_, built using components from squids, [krakens](/Monsters.aspx?ID=275), and sometimes even stranger tentacled creatures like [alghollthu](/Languages.aspx?ID=24). It's a distinct type of martial firearm that deals 1d8 piercing damage. It has the [capacity 5](/Traits.aspx?ID=399), [concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), and [fatal d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=178) traits, a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 30 feet, and [reload 2](/Traits.aspx?ID=254). The weapon itself resembles a five-barreled handheld cannon with each barrel made from a hollowed out tentacle.

<document level="2" id="action-961" />

<document level="2" id="action-962" />

<document level="2" id="action-963" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the tentacles and ink glands of a creature with a tentacle Strike and ink.
